title: The Wheel of Time
text: I shall hate the man you choose for he is not me, but love him if he makes you smile

title: Wuthering Heights
text: He wanted all to lie in an ecstasy of peace; I wanted all to sparkle and dance in a glorious jubilee. I said his heaven would be only half alive; and he said mine would be drunk: I said I should fall asleep in his; and he said he could not breathe in mine.

title: Great Expectations
text: I must be taken as I have been made. The success is not mine, the failure is not mine, but the two together make me.
